backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Knots & Folds backend, implementing product CRUD, order management, contact messages, and user profiles with role-based access control via mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: removing the visible admin password hint and changing the password to 'namita6565' in AdminLoginForm.tsx, and fixing the createProduct mutation in useQueries.ts to call the correct backend method.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose, styling, and key functionality for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Knots & Folds React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component using TanStack Router with hash history, a caffeineAdminToken URL normalization utility, and routes for the HomePage (/) and AdminPage (/admin) wrapped in a Header/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column About section component featuring a brand story, decorative imagery, and a grid of value cards styled with the pink/purple palette.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with a logo header, logout button, and tabbed interface for managing Products, Orders, and Feedback via their respective tab components.
frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.t: Renders a password-protected admin login form with show/hide toggle and a step-by-step access guide. Validates a hardcoded password and calls the onLogin callback on success.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: A contact/feedback form with name, email, and message fields that validates input and submits via a React Query mutation. Shows a thank-you state after successful submission.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Page section that displays contact information (email and Instagram cards) alongside the ContactForm component, with a decorative header and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/FeedbackTab.tsx: Admin panel tab that fetches and displays all customer contact messages in a sortable table with loading skeletons and empty/error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, social media links, quick navigation links, and a copyright notice rendered on a dark plum background with a wave SVG divider.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed site header with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll desktop navigation links, a CTA button, and a hamburger-toggled mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section for the Knots & Folds storefront, including a background image with overlays, animated decorative circles, brand headline, tagline, CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to sections, and stat badges.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: A modal dialog form that lets customers place an order by entering their name, phone, address, product selection, and quantity, with validation and a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/OrdersTab.tsx: Admin tab that fetches and displays all orders in a sortable table with color-coded status badges and a dropdown to update each order's status.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product as a styled card with an image, category, description, handmade/wool tags, an optional badge, and an optional 'Place Order' button that triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Admin modal dialog for adding or editing a product, with form fields for name, description, price, stock, image URL, and category, supporting both create and update mutations.
Renders the products section with a static grid of three ProductCard items and manages the OrderForm modal state, including optional product pre-selection when a card's order button is clicked.
frontend/src/components/ProductsTab.tsx: Admin tab component that displays a table of all products with options to add, edit, and delete them, using modals and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control if a token is present in the URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including products, orders, and contact messages (CRUD mutations and fetch queries).
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind with a pink/purple OKLCH color palette, and defines custom utility classes including a yarn-texture background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that wraps the App component with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page that conditionally renders either the login form or the dashboard based on session-stored authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that composes the Hero, ProductShowcase, About, and Contact sections into a single page layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Lato, Caveat), a pink/purple brand color palette using oklch values, custom border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'Knots & Folds', a woolen goods brand website, documenting architectural notes, existing features, known issues (broken Add Product functionality), and key details like the admin password and contact email.
